page.title: 03LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Effingham parish is run by two groups,the{Parochial Church } {Council}and the{Effingham {Residents and Ratepayers Association.} Both have the interests of the development of the village at heart. The E.R.R.A. provides ideas and investigates requests from the residents who want a quiet village with good amenities, while the P.C.C. goes into the viability of these requests. Several meetings are held a year and the job of chairman from both groups is to make sure that all matters are discussed. The residents of Effingham want a{chemist}and a few want a{youth club.}Both matters have recently been discussed. The fact that there is no{bus service}on the Common Road is also causing concern.
